recipe_text: Rhubarb Coffee Cake. Cream together 1 1/2 cups sugar and 1/2 cup butter. Add 1 egg and beat well. Alternately add 1 cup buttermilk and a mixture of 2 cups flour, 1/2 teaspoon salt, and 1 teaspoon soda. Mix thoroughly, then stir in 2 cups finely chopped rhubarb and 1 teaspoon vanilla. Pour into a greased 9 x 13-inch pan and add topping as desired before baking.
raw:
{  
  "title": "Rhubarb Coffee Cake",
  "ingredients": [
    "1 1/2 cups sugar",
    "1/2 cup butter",
    "1 egg",
    "1 cup buttermilk",
    "2 cups flour",
    "1/2 teaspoon salt",
    "1 teaspoon soda",
    "2 cups finely chopped rhubarb",
    "1 teaspoon vanilla"
  ],
  "steps": [
    "Cream together 1 1/2 cups sugar and 1/2 cup butter.",
    "Add 1 egg and beat well.",
    "Alternately add 1 cup buttermilk and a mixture of 2 cups flour, 1/2 teaspoon salt, and 1 teaspoon soda.",
    "Mix thoroughly, then stir in 2 cups finely chopped rhubarb and 1 teaspoon vanilla.",
    "Pour into a greased 9 x 13-inch pan and add topping as desired before baking."
  }
}

recipe_text: Nolan‚Äôs Pepper Steak. Roll 1 1/2 pounds round steak cut into strips in flour. Brown in a skillet, then season with salt and pepper. Combine the reserved tomato liquid from 1 can of tomatoes with 1 3/4 cups water and 1/2 cup onions. Add the browned steak, cover, and simmer for 1 hour and 15 minutes. Uncover, stir in 1 1/2 tablespoons Worcestershire sauce, then add the tomatoes and 2 diced green peppers. Simmer for 5 minutes and serve over hot cooked rice.

  "title": "Nolan's Pepper Steak",
  "ingredients": [
    "round steak",
    "flour",
    "salt",
    "pepper",
    "tomato liquid",
    "water",
    "onions",
    "Worcestershire sauce",
    "green peppers"
  ],
  "steps": [
    "Roll 1 1/2 pounds round steak cut into strips in flour.",
    "Brown in a skillet, then season with salt and pepper.",
    "Combine the reserved tomato liquid from 1 can of tomatoes with 1 3/4 cups water and 1/2 cup onions.",
    "Add the browned steak, cover, and simmer for 1 hour and 15 minutes.",
    "Uncover, stir in 1 1/2 tablespoons Worcestershire sauce, then add the tomatoes and 2 diced green peppers.",
    "Simmer for 5 minutes and serve over hot cooked rice."
  }

recipe_text: Fresh Strawberry Pie. Combine 1 1/2 cups water, 4 tablespoons cornstarch, 1 cup sugar, and 1/8 teaspoon salt in a saucepan. Bring to a boil, stirring constantly, until thick and clear. Remove from heat and stir in 4 tablespoons strawberry gelatin. Cool slightly without letting it set. Layer 1 quart cleaned strawberries in a baked pie shell, pour glaze over them, refrigerate, and serve with whipped cream.
raw:
{  
  "title": "Fresh Strawberry Pie",
  "ingredients": [
    "1 1/2 cups water",
    "4 tablespoons cornstarch",
    "1 cup sugar",
    "1/8 teaspoon salt",
    "4 tablespoons strawberry gelatin",
    "cleaned strawberries"
  ],
  "steps": [
    "Combine 1 1/2 cups water, 4 tablespoons cornstarch, 1 cup sugar, and 1/8 teaspoon salt in a saucepan.",
    "Bring to a boil, stirring constantly, until thick and clear.",
    "Remove from heat and stir in 4 tablespoons strawberry gelatin.",
    "Cool slightly without letting it set.",
    "Layer 1 quart cleaned strawberries in a baked pie shell.",
    "Pour glaze over them.",
    "Refrigerate, and serve with whipped cream."
  }
}

recipe_text: Broccoli Salad. Trim and wash 1 large head broccoli, then cut into bite-size pieces. Add 10 slices cooked, crumbled bacon, 5 sliced green onions or 1/4 cup chopped red onion, and 1/2 cup raisins. In a separate bowl, mix 1 cup mayonnaise, 2 tablespoons vinegar, and 1/4 cup sugar. Toss dressing with broccoli mixture and refrigerate for 2 to 3 hours before serving.
raw:
{  
  "title": "Broccoli Salad",
  "ingredients": [
    "1 large head broccoli",
    "10 slices cooked, crumbled bacon",
    "5 sliced green onions or 1/4 cup chopped red onion",
    "1/2 cup raisins"
  ],
  "steps": [
    "Trim and wash 1 large head broccoli, then cut into bite-size pieces.",
    "Add 10 slices cooked, crumbled bacon, 5 sliced green onions or 1/4 cup chopped red onion, and 1/2 cup raisins to the broccoli.",
    "In a separate bowl, mix 1 cup mayonnaise, 2 tablespoons vinegar, and 1/4 cup sugar.",
    "Toss dressing with broccoli mixture and refrigerate for 2 to 3 hours before serving."
  }
}

json_str:
{  
  "title": "Broccoli Salad",
  "ingredients": [
    "1 large head broccoli",
    "10 slices cooked, crumbled bacon",
    "5 sliced green onions or 1/4 cup chopped red onion",
    "1/2 cup raisins"
  ],
  "steps": [
    "Trim and wash 1 large head broccoli, then cut into bite-size pieces.",
    "Add 10 slices cooked, crumbled bacon, 5 sliced green onions or 1/4 cup chopped red onion, and 1/2 cup raisins to the broccoli.",
    "In a separate bowl, mix 1 cup mayonnaise, 2 tablespoons vinegar, and 1/4 cup sugar.",
    "Toss dressing with broccoli mixture and refrigerate for 2 to 3 hours before serving."
  }

recipe_text: Chicken Divan. Melt 1/4 cup margarine in a skillet and saut√© 1/4 cup chopped onion and celery to taste. Remove from heat and stir in 1/4 cup flour and 1/8 teaspoon curry powder. Drain 1 can mushrooms and reserve juice, adding water to make 1/2 cup liquid. Stir liquid and 1 can cream of celery soup into mixture and cook until thick. Arrange chopped broccoli and cubed cooked chicken in a baking dish, spoon sauce over, top with shredded Monterey Jack cheese, and bake at 350¬∞F until cheese melts.

    "Drain 1 can mushrooms and reserve juice, adding water to make 1/2 cup liquid.",
    "Stir liquid and 1 can cream of celery soup into mixture and cook until thick.",
    "Arrange chopped broccoli and cubed cooked chicken in a baking dish, spoon sauce over, top with shredded Monterey Jack cheese, and bake at 350¬∞F until cheese melts."
  }
}

recipe_text: Mexican Cookie Rings. Sift together 1 1/2 cups flour, 1/2 teaspoon baking powder, and 1/2 teaspoon salt. Cream 1/2 cup butter with 2/3 cup sugar, add 3 egg yolks and 1 teaspoon vanilla. Mix in dry ingredients, shape dough into rings, dip into multi-colored candies, and bake at 375¬∞F for 10 to 12 minutes.
raw:
{  
  "title": "Mexican Cookie Rings",
  "ingredients": [
    "1 1/2 cups flour",
    "1/2 teaspoon baking powder",
    "1/2 teaspoon salt",
    "1/2 cup butter",
    "2/3 cup sugar",
    "3 egg yolks",
    "1 teaspoon vanilla"
  ],
  "steps": [
    "Sift together 1 1/2 cups flour, 1/2 teaspoon baking powder, and 1/2 teaspoon salt.",
    "Cream 1/2 cup butter with 2/3 cup sugar, add 3 egg yolks and 1 teaspoon vanilla.",
    "Mix in dry ingredients.",
    "Shape dough into rings.",
    "Dip into multi-colored candies.",
    "Bake at 375¬∞F for 10 to 12 minutes."
  }
}

{  
  "title": "Mexican Cookie Rings",
  "ingredients": [
    "1 1/2 cups flour",
    "1/2 teaspoon baking powder",
    "1/2 teaspoon salt",
    "1/2 cup butter",
    "2/3 cup sugar",
    "3 egg yolks",
    "1 teaspoon vanilla"
  ],
  "steps": [
    "Sift together 1 1/2 cups flour, 1/2 teaspoon baking powder, and 1/2 teaspoon salt.",
    "Cream 1/2 cup butter with 2/3 cup sugar, add 3 egg yolks and 1 teaspoon vanilla.",
    "Mix in dry ingredients.",
    "Shape dough into rings.",
    "Dip into multi-colored candies.",
    "Bake at 375¬∞F for 10 to 12 minutes."
  }
